title: Poppy champ select bug
body: When you pick poppy she still says "valoran will know harmony" from her pre-rework, but I dunno if this supposed to happen or not but I thought I'd flag it up :)

replies.body:
Hey xVenia! 

Thanks for the report! We'll be fixing this, as she should have updated VO. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=sBNknjXs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-10T00:13:47.319+0000)
>
> Hey xVenia! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! We'll be fixing this, as she should have updated VO. ^-^

My first red reply! :) Thanks for getting back so fast, didn't know whether it was on your radar or not! Happy to help anytime :)
I've also noticed that in her champion page then abilities, if you play the video it still displays the old poppy E charge and i think either q or w, she has the old thumbnail showing :)
Yup, I believe Champion Update is working on getting those updated as well!
